channel.title: [Apollo] Lime - A Work of Art, Reconfigured - Last Revised 1/9/2012
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6BIMj.png[/img][/center]
[b]Update:[/b] I will be using the Apollo base now. Me and a good friend have discussed a few issues and resolved them.
[u][b]Programmers:[/b][/u] Brandon Logan
[u][b]Story:[/b][/u] Honestly, I am probably one of the worst Java programmers in the community with decent common knowledge. Most of the content I implement was not mine, and leeched. I've let down all of my other projects, and have abandoned them. I need to learn to differ. I've commited to improve. I'm going to be working off the Apollo base for now on. I'm going to try to learn more knowledge on Java. I'm hoping not to attract flamers. That's why I chose the base of Apollo. You may post constructive criticism to help me out.
[u][b]Plan:[/b][/u] Because of school, homework, chores, and other jobs, my time programming time will be very limited. That's why this is a "development". This project will takes months to complete and maybe when I accomplish it people will thank me.
Now, on to the basic featuers that this base offers.
[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]
World - Login - Updating - ​Rendering - Multiplayer - Update masks - Region system - Event system - Encoding/Decoding system - Support for multi-revisions - Jruby plugins
Communication - Public chat - Commands - Chat options
Inventory/item support - Item class - Inventory class - Equipment event handling class - Item Options class - Banking - Action and action queue system
File Server - JAGGRAB and HTTP server - Integrated webclient
[u][b]Updates:[/b][/u]
Update Console: [code]Tyrucca - 1/8/2012 - Started development. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Downloaded eclipse. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Deleted Solace. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Downloaded Apollo. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Added Apollo to eclipse. [/code]

item.title: [Apollo] Lime - A Work of Art, Reconfigured - Last Revised 1/9/2012
item.dc:creator: @tyrucca tyrucca
item.description:
@tyrucca wrote:

[center][/center]

Update: I will be using the Apollo base now. Me and a good friend have discussed a few issues and resolved them.

Programmers:
Brandon
Logan

Story:
Honestly, I am probably one of the worst Java programmers in the community with decent common knowledge. Most of the content I implement was not mine, and leeched. I’ve let down all of my other projects, and have abandoned them. I need to learn to differ. I’ve commited to improve. I’m going to be working off the Apollo base for now on. I’m going to try to learn more knowledge on Java. I’m hoping not to attract flamers. That’s why I chose the base of Apollo. You may post constructive criticism to help me out.

Plan:
Because of school, homework, chores, and other jobs, my time programming time will be very limited. That’s why this is a “development”. This project will takes months to complete and maybe when I accomplish it people will thank me.

Now, on to the basic featuers that this base offers.

Features:

World

  • Login
  • Updating
  • ​Rendering
  • Multiplayer
  • Update masks
  • Region system
  • Event system
  • Encoding/Decoding system
  • Support for multi-revisions
  • Jruby plugins

Communication

  • Public chat
  • Commands
  • Chat options

Inventory/item support

  • Item class
  • Inventory class
  • Equipment event handling class
  • Item Options class
  • Banking
  • Action and action queue system

File Server

  • JAGGRAB and HTTP server
  • Integrated webclient

Updates:

Update Console:

Tyrucca - 1/8/2012 - Started development. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Downloaded eclipse. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Deleted Solace. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Downloaded Apollo. Tyrucca - 1/9/2012 - Added Apollo to eclipse.

Read full topic
